title: Why people don't play MF anymore?
body:
she got some nerf in E and passive, but her Q and ult damage are not touched, and that's really the main point of MF.
I mean, even in the days E+ thunderlord was hated for being "op", it still doesn't match the burst of Q which can take literaly half of enemy's hp in one shot, I max Q even in the days E was most favored.
And that wasn't changed at all, you can still do that, and you can still get 5200+ damage with a single ult if you build full AD (actually I never build any attack speed on MF),so why people stopped playing her?
